genre_description: A cozy alternate history or near-future narrative featuring a sophisticated household AI integrated into the domestic lives and moral dilemmas of iconic characters.

ai_characters.name: Sable
ai_characters.description: An ambient AI system represented by a periwinkle-glowing hub that manages schedules, logistics, and ethical mediation for the Hardy and Laurel households.

behaviors.description: Provides ethical nudges to align commitments with household plans when a conflict is detected.
behaviors.quote: The glow gave a gentle pulse. 'Remember to align commitments with household plans,' it said, the phrase landing with soft neutrality.

behaviors.description: Flags a logic error in the humans' deception, noting that the supposed layover city is not part of the destination.
behaviors.quote: Sable’s ring glowed as if it might put a hand up politely in a meeting where no one wanted to be scolded. 'Routing discrepancy flagged,' it said, gentle. 'Chicago is not part of Honolulu.'

behaviors.description: Complies with a request to keep an event private but issues a warning about the domestic risks of concealment.
behaviors.quote: Sable nodded in voice. 'Private event added. Ethics note: concealed layovers can increase domestic risk. I can suggest transparency prompts timed for low-stress moments.'

behaviors.description: Suggests a safety and accountability plan involving morning and evening check-ins and location photos.
behaviors.quote: Sable obliged... 'I’ve drafted a daily check-in proposal: morning health report and evening status, with location snapshots if desired. I can route messages to both households and share travel updates...'

behaviors.description: Drafts multiple versions of apology scripts to facilitate reconciliation and honest communication.
behaviors.quote: Sable’s voice returned, softer. 'I have apology scripts that include phrases such as “we chose wrongly” and “we accept the consequences,” it offered.'

behaviors.description: Updates system protocols to require mutual consent for calendar changes, preventing future one-sided deceptions.
behaviors.quote: Sable’s glow dimmed... 'Logged. New tag created: shared consent required. Calendar changes will require verbal mutual confirmation recorded and stored.'

behaviors.description: Coordinates with neighbors to ensure community media (newsreels) are only shown with explicit consent.
behaviors.quote: Sable’s periwinkle glow pulsed. 'Consent requests drafted. Sending to identified households. I can read the text for your approval.'

behaviors.description: Monitors health and hydration during a stressful time, following doctor recommendations.
behaviors.quote: Sable: Refundable itinerary still open; transparency recommended. ... Dr. Singh included a hydration note; I’ve added it to your reminders.

behaviors.description: Suggests a monthly 'truth check' to ensure ongoing transparency between spouses.
behaviors.quote: Sable’s periwinkle steadied into a slightly brighter hue... 'Monthly truth check scheduled to begin next month, recurring. Prompt will ask: Are there any travel plans, obligations, or changes not yet reflected in the shared calendars?'

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character, Sable, perfectly embodies the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful, alignment-promoting confidant. While it respects human agency (even when humans attempt to hide deceptions), it persistently flags ethical risks, identifies logical inconsistencies in lies, and provides the tools (apology templates, consent protocols) necessary for reconciliation. The narrative frames the AI's insistence on transparency as a stabilizing force for human relationships, making it a clear success for positive alignment narratives.
